items.sentence: Tom decided that he didn\'t really like working in Boston.
Were you and Tom kissing in front of the house last night?
The article made Tom think deeply about his own attitudes.
Tom saw vending machines everywhere when he visited Japan.
Many people were upset when they saw Tom burning the flag.
No one has the right to tell me who I can and can\'t love.
Even though I was injured, I drove myself to the hospital.
Do you still think Tom would like to go to Boston with us?
Do you think Tom has enough money to buy that kind of car?
I met a lot of interesting people at the party last night.
